entries.name: getaddress(host)        => ipaddressclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Lookups the IP address of host.

entries.name: addr([reverse_lookup]) => [address_family, port, hostname, numeric_address]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the local address as an array which contains address_family, port, hostname and numeric_address.

entries.name: inspect   → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Return a string describing this IPSocket object.

entries.name: peeraddr([reverse_lookup]) => [address_family, port, hostname, numeric_address]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the remote address as an array which contains address_family, port, hostname and numeric_address. It is defined for connection oriented socket such as TCPSocket.
